name: Qwilfish
description: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 60 more damage.
